summary: Fred the Risen is a conjured Necro-Skeleton. He is very empowered NPC.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://s11.postimage.org/gzs2lavsj/2013_02_07_00008.jpg[/img]
[/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod gives to you a new spell tome: Conjure Fred the Risen.
Fred is a frantic and psychotic Necro-Skeleton and kills any enemy for you! He have a Barbarian class and he have a daedric battleaxe.
The spell costs is the same as the Conjure Dremora spell (expert conjuraction: 319 magicka points) and the effect duration is 60 seconds.


* WHY \"FRED\"? *
I\'ve recently played Risen, a fantastic RPG made by Piranha Byte team (the same who made the Gothic series).
In that game there was a spell to conjure a skeleton named Fred and it was very useful during the gameplay. So I\'ve made this mod to honour him :)

[center][img]http://s4.postimage.org/qo1vv2hi5/2013_02_07_00007.jpg[/img][/center]

* STATS *
As I said, Fred is a Barbarian Class and he is with lots of stamina points. He is a leveled NPC and range is from 30 to 81. So it\'s a perfect conjuraction spell for who play Skyrim in Master difficulty.


* WHERE IS THE SPELL TOME? *
You can find the spell tome at the shrine of Mehrunes Dagon. There is a magical brazier near the stairs and it contains the spell tome.


* INSTALL *
Just place the ESP file and activate it


* UNINSTALL *
Remove the ESP file


* BUGS *
No bugs and known issues to report. If you find one, please report to me.


* FACEBOOK *
I\'m on Facebook: I\'m glad if you join in:
[url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods[/url]

* ENJOY *
author: MannyGT
